entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Woodstock
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:42 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -15.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 5:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -15.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -29
Dewpoint: -18.4°C
Wind: WSW 43 km/h gust 60 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 40 gusting to 70 after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:35 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 4:35 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 4:35 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 60%
